name: In the Dark (itch) (lilou_cormic)
description:
Navigate platforms in the dark.

I know it's missing eye candy and that it's short. Feedback on the gameplay itself would be much appreciated. Thanks!

Made in less than 24 hours for 8 Bits to Infinity ~ Platformer Week for which the theme was Darkness. Made in Unity 2018.3.7f1.

Contains music ©2019 Joshua McLean (mrjoshuamclean.com)
